filters.by_person_update: function(doc, req) { return doc._id === '_design/post_processing' || doc.data && doc.data.type && doc.data.type ==    'PersonUpdate' }
filters.by_exchange_request: function(doc, req) { return doc._id === '_design/post_processing' || doc.data && doc.data.type && doc.data.type == 'ExchangeRequest' }
